info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:29PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cochise County through 415 PM MST... At 328 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Hereford, or 9 miles east of Sierra Vista, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sierra Vista and Hereford. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 328 and 337. Route 90 between mile markers 327 and 336. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
